revised_title: Gigantic Land-Tortoises: Aldabra Group and Mascarene Islands
tldr: The author examines the living and extinct races of gigantic land-tortoises, focusing on the Aldabra Group and Mascarene Islands. Through the addition of valuable materials and supplementary information, the author demonstrates that the round-headed division of tortoises is limited to Aldabra and not found in the Mascarene Islands. The study also provides a synopsis of the differences between the tortoises from these two regions.
